original_title: BOI woos more investments from Belgium
original_body_lines: Gilles Dosogne from BIO Investment Belgium with the SDB Bank team met with the Chairman and senior officials of the BOI last week. Belgian Investment Company for Developing Countries, is a private company, based in Brussels, Belgium. The mission of the Belgian Investment Company for Developing Countries is to support a strong private sector in developing and/or emerging countries. The team discussed capital markets, banking sector and other opportunities. BIO invests in small and medium-sized enterprises, financial institutions, and infrastructure projects, contributing to socio-economic growth in developing countries. BIO has investments in the Sri Lankan banking sector.
